successes.title: La Fenice: World's first Induction coffee machine
successes.description: Electromagnetic induction coffee maker, can instantly prepare  a  perfect ESPRESSO and a perfect AMERICAN FILTER COFFEE

Pledges.description: WALL OF FAME - Each dollar is important, thank you very much! We’ are constructing our web site and we’ll  write your name on our “Wall of Fame” section.
MILK FROTHER  - If you really need to enjoy a perfect Cappuccino, here you are our AUTOMATIC MILK FROTHER AND HEATER. Retail Value ( $ 70 ).
DYNAMOMETRIC TAMPER - An essential tool used to perfectly press your coffee , retail value ( $ 90 )
ITALIAN GRINDER - A Cool Electric coffee grinder with low speed conical grinding mechanism made of special tempered steel to prevent coffee from overheating.

EARLY BIRD - Be the first to own our innovative coffee machine, with this early bird you can save $ 249. With this pledge you will receive LA FENICE choosing between the black or the chrome one. ONLY FOR THE FIRST 150 bids.
LA FENICE - Did you not succed to be one of the first backers?  Don’t worry! You still can be one of the first owner of LA FENICE and save $ 199 from the retail price
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - A new complete package with a special price! Your reward is: LA FENICE, a PROFESSIONAL DYNAMOMETRIC TAMPER and an AUTOMATIC MILKFROTHER AND HEATER. Save $ 289
La Fenice Package - Second Run - Your reward is: LA FENICE, a PROFESSIONAL DYNAMOMETRIC TAMPER and an AUTOMATIC MILKFROTHER AND HEATER.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Are you a real coffee lover? Yes, you are! At this level you’ll receive all the equipment you need to fully enjoy your coffee machine. Your reward is: LA FENICE, a PROFESSIONAL ITALIAN GRINDER, a PROFESSIONAL DYNAMOMETRIC TAMPER and an AUTOMATIC MILKFROTHER AND HEATER. All you need with the best price. ONLY 40 PCS AVAILABLE. Retail price $ 969

COFFEE LOVER - Are you a real coffee lover? Yes, you are! At this level you’ll receive all the equipment you need to fully enjoy your coffee machine. Your reward is: LA FENICE, a PROFESSIONAL ITALIAN GRINDER, a PROFESSIONAL DYNAMOMETRIC TAMPER and an AUTOMATIC MILKFROTHER AND HEATER. 
ONLY 40 PCS AVAILABLE.  Save $ 369

LIMITED EDITION - Only 99 handmade units all over the world. Copper, brass, chestnut wood and original handmade Murano glass. La Fenice LE is also customizable and your name will be written on it next its serial number. A picture of your coffee machine and your name will be also published on the wall of fame dedicated to the limited edition coffee machines owner. Only for the first 99 Backers.
Distributor Package, be one of our first resellers buying this special package of 10 coffee machines.
